long_description: Full of smart, trail-ready features, the SRAM X9 Type-2 10-speed rear derailleur delivers quiet, precise operation so you can shred singletrack in peace. Self-lubricating Roller Bearing Clutch(TM) provides 1-way damping to eliminate derailleur bounce and chain slap without sacrificing shifting precision. Exact Actuation means precise, even gear changes throughout the shifting range-when you move a shifter, the derailleur moves the same amount for 1:1 action. Cage Lock simplifies wheel changes and chain installations by allowing the derailleur to be locked in an extended position that puts slack in the chain. Capable of handling up to a 36-tooth cassette cog. The SRAM X9 Type-2 10-speed rear derailleur is compatible with all SRAM 10-speed shifters; available as either a medium or long cage length.
short_description: Full of smart, trail-ready features, the SRAM X9 Type-2 10-speed rear derailleur delivers quiet, precise operation so you can shred singletrack in peace.
